title: Anybody know any more details about the NA LCS finals in Toronto?
body:
The original article about the Finals being hosted at the ACC in Toronto said that more details to come late June. It's late June, and I'm curious if I've missed something.

Thanks :)

replies.body:
Although Sunday is sold out, we still have tickets for Saturday! http://www.ticketmaster.com/event/100050C8B5AF5182

There's also the Riftwalk community event if you'll be in Toronto around that time: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/riftwalk

Here's the promo code blurb that's on the Ticketmaster page if you end up needing it:

> Hold onto the promo code NALCSRIFT6 as we'll announce an additional experience in Toronto on June 23rd. Stay tuned to the League of Legends website for more information.
This gonna be sick. Been in there so many times never expected a damn LEAGUE GAME there LOL. Parkings a bitch use transit
You did miss something unfortunately. They posted this quite a while ago. http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/how-get-your-2016-na-lcs-summer-finals-tickets
Aw. I've been checking the lol news every day :( lame
